document.full_text: andy roddick became the first player to reach the quarterfinals at queen's club on thursday by defeating 15th-seeded kevin anderson of south africa 6-4, 6-4.
document.title: roddick reaches quarterfinals at queen's club
lines_and_colors: andy roddick became the first player to reach the quarterfinals at queen's club on thursday by defeating 15th-seeded kevin anderson of south africa 6-4, 6-4.
